targets.query:
SELECT sum("last") / 1000000000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."upstream_tx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'bits_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") / 1000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."upstream_tx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'packets_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") / 1000000000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."downstream_rx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'bits_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") / 1000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."downstream_rx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'packets_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT count("last") 
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."downstream_rx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'packets_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)
SELECT last("value") FROM "downstream_rx" WHERE ("type" = 'average_frame_size_per_second') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "downstream_rx" WHERE ("type" = 'average_frame_size_per_second') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("last") /1000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."downstream_rx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'dropped_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") 
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."downstream_value" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'active_cms_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") /1000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."upstream_rx" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'dropped_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") /1000
FROM
(
SELECT last("value") 
FROM "autogen"."downstream_value" 
WHERE ( "type" = 'sched_dropped_per_second')
GROUP BY host
)

SELECT sum("last") / 1000000
FROM
(

SELECT last("value") FROM "intel_rdt_value" WHERE ("host" = 'localhost' AND "type" = 'memory_bandwidth' AND "type_instance" = 'local')
GROUP BY instance
)
GROUP BY time(10s) fill(previous)
SELECT distinct("value") /1000000000 FROM "downstream_rx" WHERE ("host" = 'service_group_0' AND "type" = 'bits_per_second') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
